channel.title: Barrage KO PvP 317 ~~~First Release!~~~
channel.description:
Hey guys this is my v.1 of Barrage KO PvP 317 I Put Almost All Summer Into IT So I Hope Someone Finds Use For It :D Also No ANTI LEECH ... so yeah hope you enjoy it while its possibly partially popular xD .. uhmm ill hopefully be realeasing v2 before school starts yet once again... lmfao 2 weeks tops so yeah.
DL Link (MegaUpload) -[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Z0X27XQ6]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=Z0X27XQ6[/url] DL Link (UPPIT) - [url=http://uppit.com/v/8EUJLOTR]http://uppit.com/v/8EUJLOTR[/url] Client DL Link (UPPIT) - [url=http://uppit.com/v/OIJLJV5H]http://uppit.com/v/OIJLJV5H[/url] Heres Some Pics -
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/miymq1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/29z9zdg.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/e6da9z.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/1530cna.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/29c2kwh.jpg[/img]
Credits - Me For Recoding Shops/PvP System/Home/Also Adding New Weapons etc. - Godz-Gamerz for Source - Delta For Base - Mopar tuts - Any Friends That Helped Special Thanks To - Q and Dylan For helping me the most.
Hope you enjoy the source and use it.. with regards - Barrage KO PvP Staff and Friends!
As you notice i only credit myself 50% when my mates told me i should credit myself more.. im not one of them people that like to be constantly crediting myself for more than what i did. im just not like that so enjoy it and please if u use this dont credit yourself 100% atleast leave a little for me and Godz-Gamerz

item.title: Barrage KO PvP 317 ~~~First Release!~~~
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:27, topic:297273”]This is the shitty source I’ve seen yet; How much downloads did this get?

I’m going to tell you why I think it is shitty.

Looks like a gay Czar/Allstar Mix
Looks very glitchy
Does this have any classes to handle packets? (ItemOnItem.java, ObjectHandler.java…) etc.
I bet your client.java is over 700kb?
Doesn’t look stable
All you did was basically move NPC’s around and add a new pvp system (which is very glitchy and unstable anyway)
No godsword specs or anything…
All the talking npcs look sloppy & The home looks crowded and messy

The list goes so much on… so much flaws… I don’t really think it’s YOUR programming skills in particular; But the base you used behind it.[/quote]

Nice way to gravedig twat.

Read full topic

The list goes so much on… so much flaws… I don’t really think it’s YOUR programming skills in particular; But the base you used behind it.

item.description:
@xi_maul_ix wrote:

H @ X 0 R::

Wow… this is stupid whats with all the leeches all u did is move the npc’s to karamaja or wherever they are, all the spec’s were added before along with the pvp system. Your repping this guy for moving npc’s ^.^ NiceCoding.

actually d claw spec was glitched it would show 8 hits which of 4 were fake but only 1 would spam itself so i fixed that, also dd spec i had to add and also i recoded pvp system which was also WAYYYYY messed up also i raised points per kill which also i raised the prices for items and also added new commands never used on a source so can you say dont flame me pl0x and dont bother to reply if u dont have anything nice to say. i recoded this about 85% of the entire source and i cleaned it up better than most would ESPECIALLY you… beginner coder tbh… l2code then come talk to me… i only spent 2 months coding this and cleaning it so dont bother to harass me pl0x if ur gonna be an asshole just dont reply to the topic this isnt a leech i did enough coding to where its not considered a leech way over enough coding. so like i said dont reply if your gonna be negative.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2009, 10:36:46 pm[/size][hr]i will be adding client link asap im just sorta busy atm…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2009, 10:53:13 pm[/size][hr]enjoy it…
